CustomField.description: Cards can be categorized into what the intent of the card was. For example, a card may be about a Business Goal or Persona. Use category mappings to adjust the intent. Category mappings use x and y coordinates to determine intent.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Cards can be categorized into what the intent of the card was. For example, a card may be about a Business Goal or Persona. Use category mappings to adjust the intent. Category mappings use x and y coordinates to determine intent.
CustomField.label: Intent Category
